name: Camposition
description:
Explore the scenic camp and as the saying goes "take only pictures, leave only footprints." Use your trusty camera to try and line up either a cross composition shot or a rule of thirds composition shot. Enjoy the relaxed vibe while you practice you composition skills at your own pace.

WASD- Move
Mouse- Look Up/Down and Left/Right
Right Click- Take out your Camera
Left Click- Take a Picture (only when camera is out)
QE- Tilt your head to the side
1- Switch to the Cross Composition (only when camera is out)
2- Switch to the Rules of Thirds Composition (only when camera is out)
Tab- Bring up a list of example compositions to take pictures of 

This project was complete by myself,  Dillon Lynch, Arthur Karapateas, Emmanuel Otero, and Yamiset Trujillo as a two week project at the Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy within the University of Central Florida.
